page.title: 03Coolham & Shipley/Employment
page.content:
Our survey asked people to say whether they are employed within or outside the block, the kind of employment and how they go to work.
WORKING WITHIN AREA - 35% of returns. INDUSTRY : 12% FARMING : 12% PROFESSIONAL: 32% RETIRED : 44%
WORKING OUTSIDE AREA - 65% of returns. INDUSTRY : 22.5% FARMING : 4.5% PROFESSIONAL: 73.0%
Of sample, majority work out of area, are professional and travel by car. Very little employment in area, but unemployment rare. Survey produced approximately 50% response.
